column2: bmi_mean <- data %>% filter(! BMI == 0) %>% group_by(Outcome) %>% summarize(avg = mean(BMI)) %>% .$avg
bp_mean <- data %>% filter(! BloodPressure == 0) %>% group_by(Outcome) %>% summarize(avg = mean(BloodPressure)) %>% .$avg
st_mean <- data %>% filter(! SkinThickness == 0) %>% group_by(Outcome) %>% summarize(avg = mean(SkinThickness)) %>% .$avg
gl_mean <- data %>% filter(! Glucose == 0) %>% group_by(Outcome) %>% summarize(avg = mean(Glucose)) %>% .$avg
